description: A qualitative system of 12 cognitive perspectives (angles) for analyzing meaning emergence.

perspectives.name: meta
perspectives.description: The frame of frames. System looking at itself.

perspectives.name: associative
perspectives.description: Quick jumps between ideas, free connections.

perspectives.name: absurd
perspectives.description: Logic turned inside out, connecting the unconnectable.

perspectives.name: naive
perspectives.description: Childlike direct logic, observation without filters.

layer_system.purpose: Layers (A-L) indicate qualitative deviation from base measurement point.
